abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook discusses ways in which  recently deceased pop star Prince pioneered various technologies in music industry and maintained control of his image and music.

headline.print_headline: Translating His Soul Into Music, Then Shrewdly Sowing It to Fans
headline.main: Prince, a Master of Playing Music and Distributing It

snippet: The artist both embraced and hated technology as he tried to upend the music industry — realizing that making music wasn’t his only responsibility.
lead_paragraph: The artist both embraced and hated technology as he tried to upend the music industry — realizing that making music wasn’t his only responsibility.
